<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104179</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104179</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205830</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Poetry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poésie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποίηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poesía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides more than 40 books of (and about) poetry written in the 19th century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt mehr als 40 Bücher (und ungefähr) Poesie 
zur Verfügung, die in das 19. Jahrhundert geschrieben wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit plus de 40 livres (et environ) de poésie 
écrite au 19ème siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece mais de 40 livros (e aproximadamente) da 
poesia escrita no 1ø século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce più di 40 libri (e circa) della poesia 
scritta nel diciannovesimo secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει περισσότερα από 40 βιβλία (και περίπου) 
της ποίησης που γράφεται στο 19$ο αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a más de 40 libros (y alrededor) de 
poesía escrita en el diecinueveavo siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205830</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
